robotics.title: Robotics
robotics.description: Explore the fascinating world of robotics!
robotics.subtitle: Discover the power of technology and unleash your creativity with our educational robotics kits.

arithmetic.title: Arithmetic
arithmetic.description: Master the art of numbers and calculations!
arithmetic.subtitle: Unlock the secrets of mathematics and develop your problem-solving skills with our educational arithmetic kits.

physics.title: Physics
physics.description: Unleash the wonders of the physical world!
physics.subtitle: Embark on a journey of scientific discovery and explore the laws that govern our universe with our educational physics kits.

woodensets.title: Wooden sets
woodensets.description: Ignite your imagination with wooden sets!
woodensets.subtitle: Build, create, and let your creativity soar with our educational wooden sets that inspire hands-on learning and innovation.

Header.description: The expert in challenging technical materials for schools and individuals. Explore our range and be inspired by our high-quality products that stimulate learning and discovery. At PMOT, we make technology accessible and engaging for everyone!

Footer.subscribe-subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest news, offers, and product releases.
